duties_responsibilities.duty: Grow revenue and profits by executing sales tactics to customers over the phone.
Educate customers on pricing and sell them on the benefits of using our products.
Place a minimum of 65 calls daily to existing and prospective customers.
Maintain records on customer contact activity and input orders.
Sell add-ons and promotional items to continually penetrate accounts.
Log all inbound & outbound calls and maintain a good follow-up system for re-orders.
Grow and maintain a book of accounts.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED; (undergraduate degree beneficial)
